title: Total player salaries in the sports industry by league 2018/19
yAxis: Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Sports League in the x axis and Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Sports League NFL and lowest at Sports League CFL.
The highest Sports League NFL has 4.9 more Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars than the lowest Sports League CFL.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars for 17 number of Sports Leagues.
Sports League NFL has the highest Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars and CFL has the lowest Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars.
The second highest Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Sports League MLB.
